Class AbstractGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MyGraph

    public abstract class AbstractGraph
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graph
    Abstract base class for graphs. A graph is a set of vertices and a set of edges.
